spec_data.Name: libskk
spec_data.Description:
The libskk project aims to provide GObject-based interface of Japanese
input methods.  Currently it supports SKK (Simple Kana Kanji) with
various typing rules including romaji-to-kana, AZIK, ACT, TUT-Code,
T-Code, and NICOLA.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:30:32 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library to deal with Japanese kana-to-kanji conversion method
